name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_FraudulentTransactions_EmailTemplates
description: Rule to return email templates for Fraudulent Transactions category and case types
sail_code:
{ a!map( templateName: "Credit Card Dispute Approval", subject: "Your Credit Card Dispute Has Been Resolved - Approved", body: "

Hello,

We are writing to inform you that the credit card dispute you submitted regarding your transaction has been resolved and approved.

Following our review of the information you provided and our investigation, we have determined that your dispute is valid. As a result, a credit has been applied to your credit card.

You should see this credit reflected in your account statement within 7 business days. Please note that the exact timing may vary depending on your card issuer's processing procedures.

We understand that dealing with disputed transactions can be frustrating, and we appreciate your patience during this process. We hope this resolution is satisfactory.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us by replying to this email.

Sincerely,

The Acme Corp. Team

", emailTemplateUuid: "fb901851-3eaf-47ea-9758-4be332b54359" ), a!map( templateName: "Credit Card Dispute Rejected", subject: "Your Credit Card Dispute Has Been Resolved - Rejected", body: "

Hello,

We are writing to inform you about the status of the credit card dispute you submitted regarding your transaction.

Following a thorough review of the information you provided and our subsequent investigation, we have unfortunately determined that we are unable to approve your dispute at this time.

Our investigation did not reveal sufficient evidence to support your claim. The information provided did not clearly demonstrate the discrepancy you described.

Contact your credit card issuer directly to explore further options.

If you have any questions about this decision or would like further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us by replying to this email.

Sincerely,
The Acme Corp. Team

", emailTemplateUuid: "81707877-a482-4575-b27d-9a9952976ffe" ) }
